elements.Text: Do you think your friend will have a good time with you?

elements.name: Collecting an old friend_Social Situations_comp_question
elements.incorrect_feedback: Whoops! That doesn't look right. Please wait a moment and try again.

elements.text: Remember, the more you practice thinking about situations in new ways on our app, the more you'll be able to think positively about scary situations in your life!
